N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-1.6 - Need standards and payment levels

State Regulations
(a) In determining need for RCA, a social
services district must apply the need standards for Family Assistance (FA)
established under Part 352 of this Title. (b) In determining the amount of the RCA
grant to be provided, a social services district must apply the payment level
which would be appropriate for an eligible filing unit of the same size under
the FA program. (c) The payment of
RCA must begin on the same date, in relation to the date of application, as
assistance under the FA program would begin as provided by section
351.8
of this Title. Notes
